blogs.title: DK Products E-Commerce Website
blogs.content:
### DK Products E-Commerce Website

For my university viva project, I developed a complete e-commerce platform for **DK Products**, a Sri Lankan spice company. The system includes product management, category filtering, shopping cart functionality, and a secure checkout process. I designed both the frontend and backend from scratch, ensuring clean UI, smooth navigation, and strong database performance.

This project strengthened my skills in **full-stack development, form validation, image uploads, and MySQL database architecture**.

**Technologies:** PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript

blogs.title: HeyBuddy Chat Application
blogs.content:
### HeyBuddy Chat Application

HeyBuddy is a real-time chat application I built for my React Native viva. It includes features such as instant messaging, user presence, typing indicators, media sending, and read receipts. I created the backend using **MySQL + PHP**, and the mobile app using **React Native**, designing a modern and responsive interface similar to WhatsApp.

This project allowed me to work with **real-time communication, optimized queries, and structured backend API development**.

**Technologies:** React Native, PHP, MySQL, WebSockets

blogs.title: Lifeline Mental Health App
blogs.content:
### Lifeline Mental Health App

Developed in collaboration with **Tecxa's Research & Development Team**, Lifeline is a mental health application created to support schools and workplaces. It provides tools such as mood tracking, counseling modules, wellness reminders, and early-warning indicators.

Our work on Lifeline earned a **Merit Award at the British Computer Society (BCS) – NBQSA National ICT Awards 2024** in the *eHealth & Wellbeing* category.

This project helped me gain professional experience in **large-scale mobile app development, teamwork, UI/UX design, and mental health–focused software research**.

**Technologies:** React Native, React, Node.js, Tailwind CSS, MySQL

blogs.title: NASA Space Apps Challenge Weather App
blogs.content:
### NASA Space Apps Challenge Weather App

Our team developed an advanced weather forecasting app for the **NASA Space Apps Challenge 2025**. The system uses **Prophet AI** for long-term predictions and integrates NASA-powered weather calibration datasets. We built the app with React and Firebase to support smooth, real-time data visualization.

We won **1st Place in Sri Lanka**, were nominated for NASA's global competition, and made history by becoming the **first-ever Sri Lankan team to reach the Top 40 Global Finalists** among 1290+ international submissions.

**Technologies:** React, Firebase, Prophet AI, NASA APIs

blogs.title: SMART POS System
blogs.content:
### SMART POS System

As part of our Software Application Development module, I created a complete **Point-of-Sale (POS) system** designed for retail businesses. The system features:

- Sales and billing
- Inventory management
- Supplier tracking
- Stock alerts
- Reporting and analytics

All UI components and layouts were custom-designed by me using **Java Swing**, and the backend was powered by **MySQL**.

**Technologies:** Java Swing, MySQL, OOP

blogs.title: Montessori Static Website
blogs.content:
### Montessori Static Website

I developed a fully responsive, static website for a Montessori school. The site showcases their services, facilities, staff profiles, and enrollment details. My focus was on creating a friendly, clean, and modern interface suitable for parents exploring early-childhood education options.

**Technologies:** HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP

blogs.title: UniLink University App
blogs.content:
### UniLink University App

UniLink is an app designed to connect university students with lecturers more efficiently. Students can book personal academic sessions, chat with lecturers through a WhatsApp-like interface, and manage their schedules. The system also includes a **React web dashboard** for administrators.

This project won **1st Place at Hacktivate 2025 by NSBM Green University**.

**Technologies:** React Native, React, Node.js, Firebase

blogs.title: Smart Drone Pod App
blogs.content:
### Smart Drone Pod App

As part of a research project in our degree program, I led an 8-member team to create a mobile application that manages a **smart drone delivery pod** for high-rise buildings. The pod allows drones to land safely, deposit food or medical supplies, and maintain correct internal temperature until users retrieve their items.

The app controls:

- Pod door automation
- Delivery tracking
- Drone landing coordination
- Real-time IoT sensor monitoring

I handled the complete UI/UX and app development.

**Technologies:** React Native, Node.js, IoT Systems, Team Leadership
